name: carts
description: These are various simple assemblyscript wasm carts, used for testing.

scripts.build:justlog: asc src/justlog.ts -o build/justlog.wasm --optimize --runtime stub --exportRuntime --stats && cd build && cp justlog.wasm main.wasm && zip -r justlog.null0 main.wasm && rm main.wasm
scripts.build:http: asc src/http.ts -o build/http.wasm --optimize --runtime stub --exportRuntime --bindings esm --stats && cd build && cp http.wasm main.wasm && zip -r http.null0 main.wasm && rm main.wasm

author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>
